website_summaries.verdict: In general, the Skechers Flex Advantage 3.0 - Stally met the expectations of purchasers regarding comfort. It was also considered a lightweight and durable pair of workout shoes. Though it was marked true to width and size by most people, there were complaints that it was inconsistent with the brand’s measurement scheme. Another point of dissatisfaction included the lack of arch support. But in the end, the footgear came highly recommended because it was comfortable and quite supportive.
pros: The comfort provided by the Skechers Flex Advantage 3.0 - Stally during extended periods of standing and walking was commended by numerous reviewers
Plenty of people appreciated the style of the trainer
Multiple owners marked the footwear as being true to size and width
The durability of the merchandise was praised by several wearers
The lightweight nature of this model pleased some users
cons: A minority of testers complained that this model was short in length while the width was either too wide or too narrow
The arch support of the Skechers Flex Advantage 3.0 - Stally was lacking, said one critic
A commenter griped that the shoe did not accommodate custom orthotics

customer_reviews.title: Sore feet
customer_reviews.text: I've worn 2 different pairs of the older style of these shoes without too much issue over the years for placement. After just one 12 hour shift in these ny feet were in agony and I had a massive blister on my heel. The big toe of my other foot also felt slightly jammed against the top of the shoe; Size 6 shoes usually run a tad too long at the toe for me
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: So comfy.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable from the word go. Stylish and very lightweight with ridiculously comfy memory foam insole. Absolutely love them. As I picked them up at a very good price on Amazon I should also say great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Claydon

customer_reviews.title: Best comfortable footware I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Skechers shoes for many years now and find them comfortable and very consistent sizing. These shoes are very comfortable, stylish and light for playing table tennis and badminton. Wouldn't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: MR JOHN TIMMS

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizing/fit
customer_reviews.text: I already have the exact same size and model of trainer in navy blue and they fit perfectly. These however are a completely different fit - they are slightly wider, but much shorter in the length, so my toe is pressing against the front of the shoe. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Waterproof and Stylish Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm already a fan of Skechers shoes and trainers because they are always so comfortable. I already own a pair of Skechers studless golf shoes for summer and I'm impressed that they are comfortable and waterproof. I wanted some shoes with studs for Autumn golf when the ground gets a little slippery. These Skechers Flex Advantage 3 are just what I wanted. They were comfortable straight from the box. They keep the water out and they look good. The studs provide the extra grip I wanted for Autumn golfing so all in all a great purchase at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received within 2 days. Very good service.fit well and very comfy as wiith any pairs of sketchers ,uip to date colors and look great.will give them a good test soon as going on holidays and like to walk slot ,so need comfy trainers on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Skecher fan
customer_reviews.text: I am fan of Skechers shoes. I find them comfortable and well made.This is my fourth pair in various styles and this pair did not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: kipper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were as expected. I'd seen them in a shop but didn't have the colour I wanted so got them from Amazon. Extremely light and comfortable. As for longevity, that's to be found out with time.
customer_reviews.author: AG Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and hardwearing.
customer_reviews.text: As usual, amazing comfort from sketchers,bought for partner,he loves them ,I’ve already had mine for a couple of years now,good hardwearing casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl coles

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected, nice and comfy compared to other trainers i have had
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit, light as a feather very comfortable. Cool looking
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O'Riordan

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable pair of trainers I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainers... great quality and extremely comfortable. Quick delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice very comfortable walk in with memory foam inside the
customer_reviews.text: How comfortable they are very comfortable good for walks and jogging
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: As described, a good quality product at a competive price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic just feel like you’ve got slippers on all day 😁
customer_reviews.author: Penny Merces

customer_reviews.title: Slipper like comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable which I guess is one of Skechers big trading points. Wide fitting ideal for me and feather light. Don’t know how much heavy use they’d take,I will use them abroad and in good weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light, summer trainer
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, really comfortable, probably best in to ware in the summer as you feel the cold wind rush through them due to the breathable mesh material. Overall nice look and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly great style and fit always like sketchers trainers
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: They are really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes with memory foam soles that are really comfortable and look pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: jerry robertson

customer_reviews.title: light as a feather trainer
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and light trainer, bought for light use on a forthcoming holiday and confident they can be worn all day without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to walk but probably not great for any real sport or gym wear. Nice material ut not as elegant as some trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: Soft insoles as with most Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with slight flexibility so you can move your toes.
customer_reviews.author: MR P.MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers, so comfy, much cheaper than in sports stores even online. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Teresa  fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Tmaham
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality trainers. Very soft, light weight, good to walk in and reasonably priced.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tmaham

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for comfort, they're no more comfortable than any other trainers.
customer_reviews.author: miss clare ryan

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Flex Advantage 3.0-Stally Trainers
product_meta.description: Get even more comfort and response in your workout with the Skechers flex advantage 3.0 - stally shoe. Skech-knit mesh nearly one piece fabric upper in a lace up athletic training sneaker with stitching accents. Air cooled memory foam insole.
